GameStates

Class gStateMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameStates.gStateMan

  • public class gStateMan
extends java.lang.Object
    the gStateMan class is used to switch between gamestates.

    • Method Detail

      • setState

        public void setState(int s)
        the method setState is used to switch between states this happens for instance the when you die in the game the state is directly switched to the higscore state
        Parameters:
        s - the integer is to make clear to which state the switch is made
